2.TITLE: Part 1, Chapter 1: The Wanderer
2.EXPLANATION: I'd better buy a gift before I head to Tenjin Transportation. I wonder what'd work?

3.EXPLANATION: Tenjin Transportation is on West Gion Street if I remember right.

4.EXPLANATION: I should get a gift before I go apologize to Tenjin Transportation... I wouldn't want to appear rude. They're on West Gion Street.

5.EXPLANATION: I should send that money at the convenience store first.

6.EXPLANATION: I'd better hurry to where the chief is waiting. We agreed to meet at Ose Bridge.

7.EXPLANATION: I guess I don't have much choice. It could be a long night of drinking ahead.

8.EXPLANATION: It seems there are idiots like this in every town. They'll change their tune once I'm through with them.

9.EXPLANATION: Off to the next place with the chief, I guess. I wonder what was with those guys.

10.EXPLANATION: Looks like I'm going to have to beat some sense into them.

11.EXPLANATION: I've got work again tomorrow. I'd better head back to my apartment and get some rest.

12.EXPLANATION: Sosuke Komaki... I guess I'll play along.

13.EXPLANATION: It's getting late. Time to head back to my apartment.

14.EXPLANATION: I think I'll take a little look around before I head back for some sleep.

27.EXPLANATION: I'm pretty tired again today. I need an early night.

49.EXPLANATION: Better do the rounds and say my goodbyes. May as well start at New Serena.

50.EXPLANATION: Guess that's out of the way. Once I'm ready, next stop's the batting center.

52.EXPLANATION: Still got time, so guess I'll see how everyone's doing.

58.EXPLANATION: What went down in the storeroom?

94.EXPLANATION: Might as well find other sites to set traps while I wait for prey to get caught.

197.EXPLANATION: I can finally get back to that interview. Time to head back to Club Futo Momo.

268.EXPLANATION: Looks like I'll have to wait until I hear back.

269.EXPLANATION: The building next to MEB on Shichifuku Street, huh? Let's take a look.

270.EXPLANATION: It was the building next to MEB on Shichifuku Street. I'll head there now.

271.EXPLANATION: What's up with these guys? Well, this is the building where MAO Inc. is, all right.

272.EXPLANATION: What's going on here? In any case, this is the building where MAO Inc. is!

273.TITLE: Finale, Chapter 3: The Survivors
273.EXPLANATION:
Finale Chapter 2 Complete
On to Finale Chapter 3

274.EXPLANATION: Katsuya is in Kamurocho Hills. Once everything's in order, it's time to make a move.

275.EXPLANATION: That Katsuya guy is in Kamurocho Hills. Better get ready, then get going.

276.EXPLANATION: I've got to fight my way through to get to Katsuya.

277.EXPLANATION: I've gotta break through to get to Katsuya. Failure isn't an option.

278.EXPLANATION: Looks like I have to get through this to find out what I need to know.

279.EXPLANATION: It ain't my day to die! I'm not goin' down 'til I get to the truth!

280.EXPLANATION: Never thought I'd have to go up against Saejima, but I'm not pulling any punches!

281.EXPLANATION: Goin' up against Kiryu wasn't in the plan, but this's gonna be a hell of a fight!

Finale Chapter 3 Complete

283.EXPLANATION: He said he'd be waiting at Public Park 3. I wonder what the message is?

284.EXPLANATION: Once I go back to training, I won't have another chance to get away before the concert. I should take care of anything else now.

285.EXPLANATION: So Kiryu went up to the roof? Gotta catch up and talk.

286.EXPLANATION: Guess I made everyone worry. I should head back to New Serena.

288.EXPLANATION: I better finish up anything else I have left to do before tomorrow evening.

289.EXPLANATION: Better tie up any loose ends before tomorrow evening.

290.EXPLANATION: Didn't I have some unfinished business? I'd better get it done before tomorrow evening.

293.EXPLANATION: Better tie up any loose ends before this evening.

294.EXPLANATION: I'd better get any unfinished business done before this evening.

295.EXPLANATION: Tonight's the night. If there's anything left to do, I'd better do it now.

296.EXPLANATION: I should join everyone back at New Serena once I'm ready.

297.EXPLANATION: Guess I'll join everyone back at New Serena when I'm finished getting ready.

298.EXPLANATION: I'll join everyone back at New Serena once I'm ready.

299.EXPLANATION: I better join everyone back at New Serena when I'm ready.

300.EXPLANATION: I'm not letting anyone stop me here!

301.EXPLANATION: No way I'm going out like this!

302.EXPLANATION: I'm not letting anything stand in my way. They're going down!

303.EXPLANATION: Damn, where'd they all come from!? Time to give these guys a thrashing!

304.EXPLANATION: One-on-one with my sworn brother... Gotta give this everything I got!

305.EXPLANATION: Let's see if I can knock some sense into you with my fists!

306.EXPLANATION: They keep on coming... But there's no way I'm giving up!

307.EXPLANATION: There's no end to them. I'm not throwing in the towel though!

308.EXPLANATION: This won't end until I settle things with him. This time, I'll put him down for good!
